name: KZStats Local
body:
### Requirements
- PHP >5.4
- MySQL
- Apache with mod_rewrite

### Installation
1. Download latest release [here](https://github.com/joelbman/kzstats-local/releases/).
2. Extract the .zip file and move the contents to a directory on your webserver, naming it for example "stats".
3. Open up http://www.yoursite.com/stats/install/ on your browser and fill out the form.
4. Your stats page should now be working. If something isn't right, read the section below.

### Troubleshooting
- If the installer doesn't work, you can manually edit your correct values in the api/settings.example.php file and rename it to settings.php.

- If you aren't looking to build the software yourself, don't use the .zip and .tar.gz download links shown on this site. Just download the latest release provided in the "Installation" section's first step.

- If you use other any HTTP-server, replace the .htaccess file on the api directory with your webserver's own configuration to redirect all requests to index.php.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
